name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and a classic screen, this robot stands out in any crowd. Equipped with handDown arms and legs, Circuit is versatile and dexterous, capable of performing intricate tasks with ease. Its stylish glasses add a touch of sophistication to its appearance. Circuit's ability to analyze, interpret, and display electrical waveforms makes it an invaluable asset to its club. Whether it's troubleshooting electronic circuits or aiding in creative projects, Circuit's intelligence and precision are unmatched.
